name: Matt Corallo
cooked: Not quite - “seeing what shakes out” implies that we’re not confident that users will be running the modified consensus rules by the time any possible activation happens. In such a case, we’re putting the network at risk of splitting if miners decide to signal while no such large-scale upgrade has completed.
raw: Not quite - "seeing what shakes out" implies that we're not confident that users will be running the modified consensus rules by the time any possible activation happens. In such a case, we're putting the network at risk of splitting if miners decide to signal while no such large-scale upgrade has completed.
